nodes.bodyText: This will load the diagram on T4C. So first time we use the search, all diagram will be loaded no?
Yes, you're right. A check must be done here.
This works because Shape objects can only be found once their diagram is already loaded.
For that, i think we can use PlatformUI.getDecoratorManagerXX to use decorations used in Preferecnes / General / Appareance / Label Decorations.
This is a great idea. Now we have all the lock decorations under T4C :)

maybe we can use eclipse Adapters, to adapt something to something else.
That way, we can avoid hard dependencies everywhere, and being extensible quite easily.
https://github.com/eclipse/capella/blob/b05bc20ce8fc38b98ac7789c16c0f347d10d050b/tests/plugins/org.polarsys.capella.test.business.queries.ju/src/org/polarsys/capella/test/business/queries/ju/QueryAdapterFactory.java
https://github.com/eclipse/capella/blob/b05bc20ce8fc38b98ac7789c16c0f347d10d050b/tests/plugins/org.polarsys.capella.test.business.queries.ju/src/org/polarsys/capella/test/business/queries/ju/views/BqLabelProvider.java
Hum I do not see how we can adapt these objects since they are totally different: A match entry (e.g. match on name), a diagram note and other Capella elements.
It unfortunately does not work on EAttribute.
@yugansan has added the helper in EObjectLaProHelper
It's not yet on this branch. We should think about it when this is merged to 1.4.x.
